message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a high-quality item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a deal, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you halfway from my initial offer, so I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $155?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can do $160, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to do $155?
